question: Match the following quantity of electricity required to deposit various metals:
| List-I | List-II |
| a. <katex>$Ag^{+}$</katex> | i. <katex>$386000 C mol^{-1}$</katex> |
| b. <katex>$Mg^{2+}$</katex> | ii. <katex>$289500 C mol^{-1}$</katex> |
| c. <katex>$Al^{3+}$</katex> | iii. <katex>$96500 C mol^{-1}$</katex> |
| d. <katex>$Ti^{4+}$</katex> | iv. <katex>$193000 C mol^{-1}$</katex> |
